acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Lucius Desha was a student at Washington and Lee University from 1867-1872. He later worked as a lawyer and judge in Harrison Co., Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes student memorabilia of Lucius and Cave Desha, including programs, pamphlets and Michael Miley photographs of students and faculty.
